content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of stone, and my updated inventory now includes:
# - Wood: 20
# - Coal: 50
# - Stone: 10
# - Iron Ore: 50

# Now that I have enough stone, I can proceed to craft stone furnaces. Each stone furnace requires 5 stone, so I can craft up to 2 furnaces with my current stone supply.

# Step 1: Craft the stone furnaces.
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace, quantity=2)  # Crafting 2 stone furnaces.

# Step 2: Check the updated inventory after crafting.
updated_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Crafted 2 Stone Furnaces. Updated Inventory: {updated_inventory}")  # Display the new inventory after crafting.
